name: diffcyt
description: Applies statistical methods for differential discovery analyses in high-dimensional cytometry data.

properties.name: method
properties.description: Statistical method to be used. DA methods test for Differential Abundance of clusters. DS methods test for Differential State of markers within clusters.

properties.name: reference.index
properties.description: Index of the reference category to be used. Default is 1, meaning the first color (group) will be used as reference. If more than 2 groups are present, each will be compared to the reference.

metaFactors.name: Cluster
metaFactors.description: Cluster identifiers from cell population clustering.

metaFactors.name: Marker
metaFactors.description: Marker/channel identifiers. Required for DS (Differential State) methods.

metaFactors.name: Measurement
metaFactors.description: Measurement values per cell (marker expression or cell counts).

metaFactors.name: Group
metaFactors.description: Group identifiers for comparison (fixed effect), e.g., treatment vs control.

metaFactors.name: Patient
metaFactors.description: Patient or batch identifiers (random effect). Optional, used for mixed models (DA_GLMM, DS_LMM).
